Institution Name: PETER ACHIMUGU COLLEGE OF THEOLOGY, ANKPA, (AFF TO KOGI STATE UNI), KOGI STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes/NCE to include CRS/Religious Studies.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, CRS and three (3) other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Two (2) Arts subjects including CRS and any other subject.
